FuncDef:
The ospfv3 bfd enable per-link one-arm-echo command enables link-based loopback detection.
The undo ospfv3 bfd enable command disables link-based loopback detection. The ospfv3 bfd enable per-link one-arm-echo command enables link-based loopback detection. The undo ospfv3 bfd enable command disables link-based loopback detection. By default, link-based loopback detection is disabled. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
CLIs: ospfv3 bfd enable per-link one-arm-echo [ instance <instance-id> ]
undo ospfv3 bfd enable [ per-linkone-arm-echo ] [ instance <instance-id> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the instance ID of an interface.
The value is an integer in the range from 0 to 255.
